finx.utils.string_utils
=======================

.. py:module:: finx.utils.string_utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   author: dick mule
   purpose: utils for handling c++ strings



Functions

.. autoapisummary::

   finx.utils.string_utils.camel_to_snake


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: camel_to_snake(x: str) -> str

   Convert camelCaseString to snake_case_string

   :param x: any string
   :type x: str
   :return: snake_case_string
   :rtype: str
